ing: 1 fluid ounce rum cream liqueur (such as RumChataÂ®)
1/4 fluid ounce cinnamon whiskey (such as FireballÂ®)
1 teaspoon sweetened condensed milk, or to taste
des: "A crowd favorite! This is so delicious, friends make sure to come to parties when they know I'm making these!"
ins: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Pour in horchata, tequila, rum cream liqueur, agave, and cinnamon whiskey. Shake until fully chilled. Dip rim of margarita glass in condensed milk; sprinkle with cinnamon. Pour horchata mixture into the glass.
